msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the top and bottom of the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. The top and the bottom are irregularly cut. Kollesis at the beginning of payments of the column. The papyrus has two lacunae as the result of a fold in the middle of the column. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. The scribe wrote some words on the Verso, Presumably as a draft. kollesis at the end of col. 93. (MA)
